name: Bronx River Skatepark
description: Spacious skatepark along the Bronx River Greenway. Room to ride with a diverse set of features.
history: Part of the Bronx River corridor revitalization, giving South Bronx skaters a proper home park.
bestTimes: Weekday mornings — almost always empty. Great after school on weekdays too.
transitDirections: 2/5 to East 174th St, walk east to the greenway.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, rails, quarter pipe, pyramid, ledges. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Bronx skate scene in Bronx River. Part of the Bronx River corridor revitalization, giving South Bronx skaters a proper home park.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 2/5 to East 174th St, walk east to the greenway.. Weekday mornings — almost always empty. Great after school on weekdays too.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark — standard park etiquette applies.
